Gamers step into a third-person sci-fi survival horror experience that 
promises to deliver the ultimate in psychological thrills and gruesome 
action. Set in the cold blackness of deep space, the atmosphere is soaked 
with a feeling of tension, dread and sheer terror. In Dead Space, players 
step into the role of engineer Isaac Clarke Ãƒâ€šÃ¢â‚¬â€œ an ordinary man on a seemingly 
routine mission to fix the communications systems aboard a deep space mining 
ship. It is not long before Isaac awakes to a living nightmare when he learns 
that the ship&#039;s crew has been ravaged by a vicious alien infestation. He must 
fight through the dead silence and darkness of deep space to stay alive.
